mcq.statement: Who arrived in the Sub-continent and established control over the Indus Valley up to Multan?
mcq.one_liner: The conquest of the Indus Valley up to Multan was achieved by **Muhammad Bin Qasim**.

suggestions.topic: Arrival of Muhammad bin Qasim to Subcontinent (712)
